mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id AS profileUserId, a.pic, a.created_at, a.uid, a.nick_name , COUNT(DISTINCT b.feed_id) AS feedCount , COUNT(DISTINCT b.feed_id, c.user_id) AS allFeedLikeCount , COUNT(DISTINCT d.to_user_id) AS followerCount , COUNT(DISTINCT e.from_user_id) AS followingCount FROM user a JOIN feed b ON a.user_id = b.writer_user_id LEFT JOIN feed_like c ON b.feed_id = c.feed_id LEFT JOIN user_follow d ON a.user_id = d.from_user_id LEFT JOIN user_follow e ON a.user_id = e.to_user_id where a.user_id = #{profileUserId};
